item.title: Github Actions on Mac, Windows, and Linux
item.description: Small example of setting up GitHub Actions to run on MacOS, Windows, and Linux with GitHub-hosted runners. In this case what a basic checkout, build, and test pass looks like in go. # <repo>/.github/workflows/main.yml name: CI on: [push] jobs: basic: runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }} strategy: matrix: os: [macos-latest, ubuntu-latest, windows-latest] steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v1 with: path: ./src/neilpa.me/<package> - name: Build run: go build ./... - name: Test run: go test .

item.title: Default font sizes for HTML headings
item.description: The first post in a potential series to collect short snippets of web search results. This is an experiment to see if it helps better curate my notes.
